channel.title: Town and Soldout wins! SFOL41: [Ashe's Version] Grande Idea!
channel.description:
# [color=olive] Welcome to the next iteration of SFoL Grand Idea (Ashe's version)! [/color] ##### Hosted by SFOL's very own resident [color=purple] **Asheassin** [/color] Marcus and @Twil1ight **The [color=gray] Gender Neutral [/color]** ### [color=olive]Rules [/color] >
>
>
> > Forum of Lies Official Hub Forum of Lies >
>
> Welcome to the wonderful wacky (And sometimes stressful) world of FoL! > > Useful Links > Class Cards Thread! > Spreadsheet of Complete, Ongoing and Planned FoL and SFoL games! Also includes information on how to sign up to host. > The Forum of Lies Discord Server! > A friendly “how to get started” guide by one of our own players! > > General Gameplay Infomation > Rules > > Follow the Global Forum Rules > If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod … >
>
### [color=olive] Gameplay[/color] Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Scum Faction will talk through a special DM thread Priest will speak with the dead through a separate DM thread All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Card Thread ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grand-idea-fol-ashes-version/69876) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it ### [color=olive] Executions [/color] To accuse someone say “ **/accuse [player]** ” or “ **/vote [player]** ” Once majority is reached to accuse someone, a trial will begin. Either after 24 hours or once a trial reaches majority on pardon/execute, the trial will end. After the trial ends, the King has 12 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day ### [color=olive] What the bloody heck is Grande Idea? [/color] All Classes will be rolled from [this special class card thread ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grand-idea-fol-ashes-version/69876). These classes are all made by users on this forum! In regards to how many people this SFoL is intended to have, the minimum number of participants is 24, if more people decide to join then it will be maximised at a multiple of 4, and if there are a few people left overs they are able to hydra **:**>) ### [color=Olive] Journals [/color] Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed ### [color=olive] To Join [/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want # [color=olive] Players: [/color] 1. ~~Luxy~~ Died n2 [color=green] Citizen [/color] 2. MaximusPrime 3. ~~Dad (Marluxion)~~ Killed n1 The [color=steblue] **Comitatus** [/color] 4. ~~Bazingaboy~~ Lynched D3The [color=grey] Soldout[/color] 5. ~~Overtehbin~~ Died D4 [color=steblue]**The Court Wizard**[/color] 6. ~~Hjasik~~ Died N2 [color=steblue] **The best Blue Dragon**[/color] 7. ~~Bluestorm~~ The [color=grey] **Evil Prince**[/color] 8. Insanitu 9. ~~Boopydoop~~ - [color=steblue] **Lucio** [/color] 10. idk sum dude who hates fortnite (Puggo) 11.~~ a Stand~~ The **[color=steblue] Court Wizard[/color]** :eggplant: 12. ~~Livicus~~ Modkilled d2 [color=steblue] Anne Boleyn [/color] 13. Margaret :crown: 14. ~~Some dude who got binded in a game (Isaac)~~ The [color=steblue] **Prince**[/color] 15. ~~Some Gamer who likes to Poke around (Gamerpoke)~~ The [color=steblue] **Rapper**[/color] 16. ~~Squiddums~~ **[color=green]Citizen[/color]** 17. ~~Wise deer (Mercenary) :crown:~~ Died D4 [color=steblue] **King Henry VII**[/color] 18. ~~Kneebins (Nerbins)~~ Lynched D4 **[color=purple] The Bounty Hunter[/color]** 19. Son (Geyde) 20. ~~Soulshaed~~ Kai_5 21. ~~some dude who really wants to host bastard setup (Psychoneirik)~~ The [color=purple] **Reflexive MM** [/color] 22. DatBirb 23. Thor: Ragnarok IV 24. (not taken but has the name Ashley on it) ~~Aaron (WazzaAzza)~~ Died D3The [color=steblue] Vulgard[/color] Wolfy is a Spectato, Lightsin is a Spectado, Nozbugz and Boss have backed tf up **wait no Boss is speccboying w/ Meteoro and Ashley**
